    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Making Live Agent And feedback topics 'visible' flag to true, so that they would be visible in the topic selection.</description>
        <name>Make Agent and Feedback topics visible</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_cs_topic');
gr.addEncodedQuery('sys_id=ce2ee85053130010cf8cddeeff7b12bf^ORsys_id=b18df45853130010cf8cddeeff7b12fd');
gr.query();
while(gr.next()){
    if(!gr.visible){
	    gr.setValue('visible', true);
	    gr.update();
	}
}]]></script>
